annotations: Ref: 190824-REF1589751Fm: FOROCEAN SHIPPING 渝洋·海运 //new@foroceanshipping.comTo:  dear sir/Potter Guo we'd like to pps blw vslplsd to hear if any int: - MV Cenda open Jebel Ali, UAE  19th - 20th August 2024 - GoA/Red Sea passage ok- Double skinned, box shaped- 2 x 25t coils ok, deck cargo/containers ok- Voyage business only- No Israel/Russia/Ukraine trading MV CendaIMO # 9263071Abt 46,834 sdwt at on 12.11 m draftSingle Deck Double Skin Bulk CarrierBox Shaped Holds 2/3/4LOA 189.90.0 / Beam 30.5 M / Moulded Depth 16.90 mLiberia Flag Class NKBuilt Sep 20045 Holds 5 HatchesGrain 57,711.40 / Bale 55,422.52 M34 Sets Krupp Electro Hydraulic CraneSWL under hook - No.1 x 30 T, No.2-4 40 T4 sets Peiner electro-hydraulic Grabs 6-12cbmHydraulic Folding Type Hatch CoversCO2 Fitted, Mechanical VentilationAll details about Best regardsPotter Guo 郭肖潇Chartering BrokerDir: +86 0731 8225 2695Mob: +86 176 2618 6179Skype ID: JoinoceanCQ48@foroceanshipping.net ====== To reply your last original emails asf ======>>>>>>     From: Trinity-Ship Brokers <dry@trinity-ship.com>Sent: 2024/8/19 17:59:36To: Subject: 45K MT SALT IN BULK - KANDLA TO HAMAD - 19TH - 27TH AUG Dear Sir / AshishGreetings of the Day !! Please propose the firm rate for the cargo below.+++++++++ CARGO: SALT IN BULKQTTY: 45,000 MTLOAD PORT: KANDLA PORT,INDIADIS PORT: HAMAD PORTLOAD RATE: 15,000 MT SHINCDIS RATE: 5,000 MT SHINCLAYCAN: 19TH TO 27TH AUG 2024ADDCOMM: 2.5% PUS +++++++++ Plsd to rcv yr feedback  Best regardsRavindra PorwalMob : +971 553725425Skype: live:.cid.b2c866bf3a143afe  Ashish BachchanMob :  +91 9096016301Skype: live:.cid.8e1394c23505ba0aAtish WajageMob :  +91 73049 43020Skype: live:.cid.820cdb34dd3f69d5Feel free to connect with us !! For Dry : dry@trinity-ship.com Projects: projects@trinity-ship.comTankers : tankers@trinity-ship.comWebsite: www.trinity-ship.comBIMCO Member  ID 182184Please print this email only if necessary.
